review: Love my fire stick. Fast! And because it is a HMDI dongle no clutter!
author: Michael Leavers

review: Just learning on how to use it. Seems cumbersome to get out the TV remote to change the input. Then change it back to watch tv
author: Jerold

review: Very pleased with the quality and the service. Easy hook up. Provides immediate instructions and videos to assist during the setup phase.
author: Scott Varco

review: Yay I got 2 of them lol
author: tony

review: Easy to install, and user friendly
author: Julie Foster

review: I love this product.  So easy to install - especially when you have a Prime account.
author: Yvonne

review: Very easy to get started.  The Stick did all the work.  Not had much time to browse the offerings yet, but it had all of CAILLOU and Curious George series for free, so we could delete what we had recorded for our grandson and just play this back.  He loves it.
author: Tarksum "Manfred"
